documentation.text: @dev Update closed order reward
@dev Blacklist a token
@dev transfer reward for a closed order

@dev This function is called for all messages sent to
 this contract, except plain Ether transfers
 (there is no other function except the receive function).
 Any call with non-empty calldata to this contract will execute
 the fallback function (even if Ether is sent along with the call).

@dev This function is called for plain Ether transfers, i.e.
 for every call with empty calldata.

BlacklistedToken(address,address).details: Emitted when a `token` gets blacklisted by `who`.

Donated(address,uint256).details: Emitted when the donation of `value` received from `account`.

Reward(address,uint256).details: Emitted when `receiver` rewarded with `reward` amount of tokens.

RewardUpdated(address,uint256,address).details: Emitted when reward `token` and a `reward` amount apecified by `who`.

UnblacklistedToken(address,address).details: Emitted when a `token` gets un-blacklisted by `who`.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
